comments.body: You need a more comprehensive test here, more along the lines of https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/federation/pkg/dnsprovider/dns_test.go#L89

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +61,65 @@	assert.Equal(t, o1.Name, o2.Name)
	assert.True(t, ObjectMetaEquivalent(o1, o2))
	assert.False(t, ObjectMetaEquivalent(o1, o3))
	assert.True(t, ObjectMetaEquivalent(o3, o4))
	assert.True(t, ObjectMetaEquivalent(o5, o6))

comments.body:
@mwielgus Please use table driven testing as per Kubernetes conventions:

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/docs/devel/coding-conventions.md#testing-conventions

and as per example that I sent in previous PR comment:

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/federation/pkg/dnsprovider/dns_test.go#L53
